text: 3:14 Aisaia 6:10; Jon 12:40; Aposel 28:26-27; Rom 11:7-8; 11:25Ezɨ fomɨra iza datɨrɨghɨn tuzir dughiamɨn, Israelian nɨghnɨziba bar pɨrizɨ, me Godɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Ghuribar gara, dar mɨngariba deragha dagh fozir puvatɨ. Egha mati Mosesɨn guam avarazir iniravɨzim, men nɨghnɨziba avaraghavɨra iti. Ezɨ gumazitam o amizitam me avarazir iniravɨzir kam adangizir puvatɨ. Krais uabɨra, gumazim a gɨfoghtɨma, God an iniravɨzir a dukuaghav itim adegham.
